#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Toolbox 9.0.2 patches =

In this page we report all the patches created for version 9.0.2 of the Toolbox

= Patch 0.1 =

A bug on the http download via the proxy has been found. The proxy configuration settings are ignored by the Toolbox when it tries to download a file from a remote URL. This is due to an update of the HTTP library.

A patch to solve this problem has been created and can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/toolboxenvironment/downloads/detail?name=TOOLBOX_ProxyPatch.tar.gz&can=2&q= here].

Download the package and follow these instructiones:

  # Stop Tomcat
  # Copy the package in the Tomcat webapps directory. 
  # Unzip the package. This should replace the following file <TOMCAT PATH>/webapps/TOOLBOX/WEB-INF/classes/it/intecs/pisa/toolbox/plugins/nativeTagPlugin/HttpTag.class
  # Restart Tomcat
